Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
A number of parents have asked for information in Chinese regarding ‘Saturday English’.

For information on Primary courses in Chinese, CLICK HERE
小学课程中文介绍，请点击这里
For information on Secondary courses in Chinese, CLICK HERE

For the registration form in Chinese, CLICK HERE
中文注册登记表，请点击这里
If you would like your child to join the programme, kindly fill in the registration form in English and email it to shaila.chainani@bsg.org.cn or send it to school.
如果您希望您的孩子参加这个课程，请用英文填写好注册登记表并电邮至shaila.chainani@bsg.org.cn或送到学校。
Please note that registrations are now open and you need to register early to guarantee a place for your child.
该课程已开放注册，请尽早注册以确保学位。
If you require further information please contact the Director of Saturday English-Ms Shaila Chainani at shaila.chainani@bsg.org.cn Mobile: +86 13903051513
如果您需要更多信息，请联系周六英语课程总监。Ms Shaila Chainani：
电邮shaila.chainani@bsg.org.cn 手机：+86 13903051513
We look forward to seeing you make the most of this opportunity.
我们期待看到您并充分利用这次机会。
Kind regards,
Ms Shaila Chainani Head of EAL The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
